org.dblp.mmdb

Class Publication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Record
      • org.dblp.mmdb.Publication

  • public class Publication
extends Record
    A class representing dblp publication records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Publication

        protected Publication(MmdbInterface dblp,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      int mdate,
                      byte[] xml,
                      PersonName[] names,
                      PublicationStream stream,
                      int year)
        Create a new Publication.
        Parameters:
        dblp - The MMDB.
        key - The record key.
        mdate - The record mdate.
        xml - The dblp record as byte array, or null if an empty default template should be used.
        names - The PersonNames referenced in this record.
        stream - The publication stream venue referenced in this record.
        year - The publishing year.
